form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: The Zest Irrigated District in the World, The County of Imperial, The Winter Garden of America

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 "The gest Irrigated District in th World" of WINTER GARDEN THE OF IMPERIAL AMERICA JOHN BOWMAN JOHN GARTNER ASSESSOR-COLLECTOR ASSISTANT ASSESSOR EL CENTRO, CALIFORNIA May 6, 1964 The Mexican Consulate, Calexico, California, & TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN This is to certify that according to the records on file in the Office of the Assessor-Collector, County of Imperial, State of California, Tong Hay Loo & Tong Hay & Alice M. Loo, Box 1108, El Centro, California, are the legal owners of the following described property: NW2 Tract 199, T15S R 13E, 160 acres, Tract 141 T 15S R 13E 160 acres, Lot 36, Block 2, Sherman Oaks Subdivision, El Centro City. Very truly, JOHN BOWMAN Assessor-Collector County of Imperial State of California. By- Dorah D. Carr Deputy
